aws_services: VPC, EC2 (Instances, LaunchTemplate, SecurityGroups, InternetGateway, NatGateway, EIP, Subnets, RouteTables), IAM (Roles, Policies, InstanceProfile, Group), S3 (Buckets, BucketPolicies), RDS (DBInstance, DBSubnetGroup), Lambda, CloudTrail, CloudWatch Logs, Secrets Manager, Application Load Balancer (ALB, TargetGroup, Listener), SSM Parameter Store
